categories: Category:Legends short stories from Star Wars Insider

nodes.text: "Vader Adrift" is a short story written by Ryder Windham and published in the magazine Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2012. Its events take place in the aftermath of Star Wars 52

Darth Vader, Dark Lord of the Sith, has survived the destruction of the experimental battle station the "Tarkin" over the planet Hockaleg. Now adrift in his TIE fighter Vader is rescued by a veteran of The Clone Wars: a clone trooper who once served under the command of Anakin Skywalker!
This story occurs approximately 3 years after the Battle of Yavin.
